title: 2024 Kandi Kruiser 4-Passenger Electric Golf Cart (Unused)
item_description:
2024 Kandi Kruiser 4-Passenger Electric Golf Cart (Unused)

General Info

  • Condition: Unused Assembled Unit
  • Make: Kandi 
  • Model: Kruiser KS4PSLR-B
  • Year: 2024

Features

  • Solar System with Roof Panel
  • Headlights: Regular, Low Beam, and Brights
  • (2) Front Seats 
  • (2) Rear Seats
  • Ice Bucket Under Back Seats
  • Off Road Tires
  • Front and Rear Seat Belts
  • Front Bumper
  • Front Basket
  • Rear Step
  • Back-up Camera
  • Solar System
  • Blinker
  • Horn
  • Parking Brake
  • Lockable Front Cubbies
  • Front and Rear Cupholders
  • Rear View Mirrors
  • Windshield
  • Charger (Included)

Specifications

  • Engine Type: AC electric motor
  • Rated Power: 5,000 watts
  • Battery: AGM 48V
  • Charging Port: 120V
  • Drive: RWD
  • Top Speed: 20 MPH
  • Maximum Range: 40 miles
  • Charging Time: 6.5 hours
  • Dimensions: 120"L x 53"W x 78"H
  • Seat Height: 32"
  • Ground Clearance: 7.8"
  • Tires: 23 x 10.5-14
  • Wheelbase: 65.7"

Specifications were taken from the manufacturers website and were not verified by West Auctions.
